Pre-Game Insights: Egypt and Tanzania will play in a friendly match in Egypt.
Adel Amrouche, the Taifa Stars head coach is expected to use the camp in Egypt to prepare his team well ahead of the AFCON campaign.
Egypt, Ghana, Cape Verde and Mozambique are a part of Group B in AFCON 2023.
Predicted Lineup: Egypt predicted lineup: El Shenawi, Hamdy, Abdelmonem, Gabr, Hany, Elneny, Fahi, Zizo, Trezeguet, Moustafe, Salah
Tanzania predicted lineup: Kawawa, Miroshi, Hamad, Mwamnyeto, Job, Bajan, Mnoga, Salum, M’Mombwa, Samatta, Msuva
Match Prediction for Egypt vs Tanzania: Egypt are the favourites to win the match in front of the home crowd. A win will boost their confidence and the team can carry the momentum into the main tournament.
